title: Make the site logo render as a true square (no stretched/expanded tabs)

requirements.text: Update the header and footer logo rendering so the logo always appears as a true square (no stretching/expansion) and does not visually include/overlay any navigation tabs or header elements.

quotes: Just make the logo the square, it looks like the image has been expanded and now has the tabs in the logo.

acceptanceCriteria: In the SiteHeader, the logo renders within a square box and preserves its aspect ratio (no horizontal/vertical stretching).
In the SiteFooter, the logo renders within a square box and preserves its aspect ratio (no horizontal/vertical stretching).
On common viewport widths (mobile and desktop), the navigation buttons do not overlap the logo, and no tab-like UI elements appear inside the logo area.
The logo continues to load from the existing static path: /assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep using the existing logo filename and URL path: /assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png.
nonGoals: Changing the site navigation structure or labels.
Replacing the logo with a different filename/path.

edits: Crop/resize the logo to a clean, true square and remove any extra padding/expanded area that makes it look like header tabs are part of the image (blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png > blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png)
